titles: Svveet and soule-perswading inducements leading unto Christ. Deduced, 1. From the consideration of mans misery, emptinesse, basenesse, and dishonour without Christ. 2. From the meditation of the comforts attending the soules receiving of Christ. 3. From the apprehension of the joy and excellency of Christs living in man: the whole singularly sweetning the meditation of Christ to the soule of man. By Alexander Grosse, minister of Christ.
author: Grosse, Alexander, 1596?-1654.
publisher: Printed by G.M for Iohn Bartlet at the Signe of the Gilt-Cup neare Saint Austins-Gate,
notes: The imprint date is a misprint for 1642.
"The mystery of self-denyall" and "Mans misery vvithout Christ" each have separate title page dated 1642; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Jesus Christ --  Devotional literature --  Early works to 1800.
